reviews.review: Great game, I've played since Source and I'm still only gold noob qirg 536 hours played. That's how you know you made a good ass game. I have received no compensation for this review lol

Worst anti hack system ever, I hope this game starts losing its playerbase so the devs can get a stick and start improving it.

The game itself is wonderfully balanced and nuanced. The community isn't too terrible although the stereotype does exist for a reason. If you're new, I definitely recommend joining and learning this dynamic FPS, it's a really fun game that has a high skill-cap.

Dust 2 is fun, make sure to always go to B bomb site and stand behind the crate in the corner, as no one expects it and you can easily get kills with the AUG like I did. Sometimes, some people will expect it, but they're just hacking. Have fun, make sure to keep an eye out for when you're the last person left, because they leave that up to you.
